title: 如何给玩家chestcommands插件的权限？
author: DNFJJ
txt_content: 怎么给玩家左键和右键[快捷菜单]打开的权限？插件英文名是chestcommands

replies.author: DNFJJ
replies.txt_content: 我用钟设置的  怎么给玩家右键打开菜单钟的权限？

replies.author: DNFJJ
replies.txt_content:
MRTangwin8 发表于 2015-7-21 16:55
请输入/mangaddp default chestcommands.open.*
我用钟设置的  怎么给玩家右键打开菜单钟的权限？

replies.author: MRTangwin8
replies.txt_content:
DNFJJ 发表于 2015-7-21 17:03
我用钟设置的  怎么给玩家右键打开菜单钟的权限？
/mangaddp default chestcommands.item.*

replies.author: DNFJJ
replies.txt_content:
MRTangwin8 发表于 2015-7-21 17:05
/mangaddp default chestcommands.item.*
为什么也不行~

replies.author: yixiazi
replies.txt_content:
用指令打开/mangaddp builder  chestcommands.command.open.da.yml
用物品打开/mangaddp builder chestcommands.item.da.yml

replies.author: yixiazi
replies.txt_content: 可以试试 不行的话可以在提问

replies.author: DNFJJ
replies.txt_content:
yixiazi 发表于 2015-7-21 17:17
可以试试 不行的话可以在提问
不行 打不开~

replies.author: DNFJJ
replies.txt_content:
yixiazi 发表于 2015-7-21 17:17
可以试试 不行的话可以在提问
我想添加用钟 右键打开菜单的~

replies.author: qrbqrb4728116
replies.txt_content: 你在配置文件打开物品id写上钟的id了吗？

replies.author: DNFJJ
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2015-7-21 17:57
chestcommands.command.open
拿钟  右键打开菜单~

replies.author: DNFJJ
replies.txt_content:
qrbqrb4728116 发表于 2015-7-21 18:11
你在配置文件打开物品id写上钟的id了吗？
写了   ######################
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################

menu-settings:

  # name - appears as the title - REQUIRED
  name: '&b快捷菜单'

  # rows - the number of rows of the chest - REQUIRED
  rows: 4

  # command - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  # Bind multiple commands using ; (command: 'menu; m; me')
  command: 'menu'

  # This command command will be execute when the menu is opened.
  # Supports all the icon command types.
  open-action: 'sound: note pling; tell: &eYou opened the example menu.'

  # open-with-item - OPTIONAL
  # The menu will open only right-clicking with orange wool [35:1]
  open-with-item:
    id: wool:347
    left-click: false
    right-click: true
